pullrequest.title: Update the style of collapsible items

content.raw:
I believe this is a discussion for issue #16. 

I need to better collect my thoughts together and then I'll comment there, but just to give you an idea of where I am right now, after having looked at these widgets for a while and experimenting with a few things, I feel like there is a place for "panelled" widgets and a place for nested ones. GzWeb's menu for example features a combination of them. So I think we shouldn't try to look for a one-solution-fits-all approach and instead offer widgets for both options which can be combined for each use case.

So considering we do keep a nested option, I couldn't find anything in the material design spec which seemed appropriate for the kind of data we may be dealing with here, which is deeply nested.
